Text.Page: Tell Dougal that you are fully prepared for Fraywind Canyon.
Dougal invited you to the Fraywind Canyon.

Are you ready to fight in Fraywind Canyon?

The best of the federation's competitors are gathering for a big match.

, you are one of the greatest heroes I've ever met. Join them and test your prowess... then come back and let me know how you liked the competition.

Oh, . How was Fraywind Canyon?

I always knew that your combat skills were beyond comparison. I always feel relaxed after putting up such an honest fight. Really good for relieving stress!

Visit Fraywind Canyon again soon!
I can't wait to see what else you're capable of.
